'''Standard:''' [[Nagware]]
'''Premium:''' [[Commercial software]]
'''For Mac:''' [[Trialware]] | website = {{URL|http://www.speedbit.com/}} }} '''Download Accelerator Plus''' (also referred to as '''DAP''') is a [[download manager]] for [[Microsoft Windows]] and [[Mac OS X]]. It uses [[Download acceleration|multipart download]] to increase speeds, creating multiple connections of different file segments to speed up downloads. Download Accelerator Plus works by splitting files into smaller pieces and automatically seeking faster mirrors. It also can get a file simultaneously from several sites. Download Accelerator Plus comes in three editions: ''DAP Free'', ''DAP Premium'' and ''DAP for Mac''. ==References== {{Reflist|refs= {{Cite web | title = Download Accelerator Plus 9.4 - CNET editors' review | url = http://download.cnet.com/Download-Accelerator-Plus/3000-2071_4-10037157.html | work = [[Download.com]] | publisher = CBS Interactive | date = 2 December 2008 | last = Rosenblatt | first = Seth | accessdate = 17 June 2011 }} {{Cite web | title = Download Accelerator Plus - Changelog | url = http://www.softpedia.com/progChangelog/Download-Accelerator-Plus-Changelog-6542.html | work = [[Softpedia]] | publisher = SoftNEWS NET SRL | accessdate = 17 June 2011 }} {{Cite web | url = http://www.speedbit.com/features/?ref=ProductsPage_Own | title = DAP 9.6 â Advanced technology for the best overall performance | work = SpeedBit.com | publisher = SpeedBit | accessdate = 17 June 2011 }} {{Cite web | url = http://www.speedbit.com/mac/ | title = DAP for Mac | work = SpeedBit.com | publisher = SpeedBit | accessdate = 17 June 2011 }} }} ==External links== *{{Official website|http://www.speedbit.com}} {{Download managers}} [[Category:Download managers]] [[Category:Shareware]] [[Category:Commercial software]] {{Windows-software-stub}} {{Mac-software-stub}} [[ar:Ø¯Ø§ÙÙÙÙØ¯ Ø£ÙØ³ÙÙØ±Ø§ØªÙØ± Ø¨ÙØ³]] [[fa:Ø¯Ø§ÙÙÙØ¯ Ø§Ú©Ø³ÙØ±ÛØªÙØ± Ù¾ÙØ§Ø³]] [[it:Download Accelerator Plus]] [[pt:Download Accelerator Plus]] [[ru:Download Accelerator Plus]] [[th:à¸à¸²à¸§à¸à¹à¹à¸«à¸¥à¸à¹à¸­à¸à¹à¸à¹à¸¥à¸­à¹à¸£à¹à¸à¸­à¸£à¹à¸à¸¥à¸±à¸ª]]
